attributes.action: organise a charity show in a park with celebrity guests (the jonas brothers ......)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: their are many areas around London that need refurbushing,E.G parks football pitch's benchs and areas to walk your dog.Their are not many Around London, so im petitioning to organise a charity show in a park, with concert(s) from famous people and rides amongst other things for charity. all the money raised will go to making London a nicer place for us all to live in.
